description: Provides a detailed view of a Remediation Execution for a set of resources including state, timestamps for when steps for the remediation execution occur, and any error messages for steps that have failed. When you specify the limit and the next token, you receive a paginated response.

parameters.name: ConfigRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the Config rule.

parameters.name: ResourceKeys
parameters.description: A list of resource keys to be processed with the current request. Each element in the list consists of the resource type and resource ID. (dict) --- The details that identify a resource within Config, including the resource type and resource ID. The resource type. The ID of the resource (for example., sg-xxxxxx).

nested_params.name: resourceId
nested_params.description: The ID of the resource (for example., sg-xxxxxx).

nested_items.name: RemediationExecutionStatuses
nested_items.description: Returns a list of remediation execution statuses objects.

nested_items.name: ResourceKey
nested_items.description: The details that identify a resource within Config, including the resource type and resource ID.

nested_items.name: resourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource (for example., sg-xxxxxx).

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The valid status of the step.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: An error message if the step was interrupted during execution.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time when the step started.

nested_items.name: StopTime
nested_items.description: The time when the step stopped.

nested_items.name: InvocationTime
nested_items.description: Start time when the remediation was executed.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the remediation execution was last updated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken string returned on a previous page that you use to get the next page of results in a paginated response.
